content.query:
SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.sql_workers_raw
Go

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_filas FROM dbo.sql_workers_raw;
GO

SELECT 
    SUM(CASE WHEN first_name IS NULL OR first_name = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS nulos_nombre,
    SUM(CASE WHEN email IS NULL OR email = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS nulos_email,
    SUM(CASE WHEN phone1 IS NULL OR phone1 = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS nulos_telefono
FROM dbo.sql_workers_raw;
GO
